summary: Wikipedia is a free online encyclopedia created by volunteers from all over the world. It is the largest encyclopedia in history, with millions of articles in over 300 languages. Founded in 2001, it is now one of the most visited websites globally and is known for its extensive coverage of topics. While Wikipedia has faced criticism for bias and reliability issues in the past, it has improved and become a trusted source of information. It is used by people from all countries, with the United States, Japan, and the UK being the top contributors to its traffic.
title: Wikipedia
